casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David Matthew LOWE. No. 278PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Feb. 16, 2016. M. Gordon Widenhouse, Jr., Chapel Hill, for Lowe, David Matthew. Derrick Mertz, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 16th of February 2016 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of February 2016."
